title: FS: T206 SGC 30 (and a few AUTHs)
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 SGC 30 (and a few AUTHs)
posts.post_content:
Most of these are fresh from slabbing in Jersey.  Price includes delivery; paypal preferred.  For the most part, these are all VERY nice 30s.  Flaws do exist, but the eye appeal is wonderful.  Feel free to make an offer on multiples:

[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100169"]Check out front and back scans here.[/URL]  There is an option to download each scan which will give you a larger view.  
I also have [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=151068"]SGC 40s[/URL] and [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=151257"]SGC 50s[/URL] for sale.
